definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
to save/to get rid of (so saving space)
to prevent or treat a disease
to die/to be done with this world

sentences.english: What the little boys didn't know was that a second train was heading straight for them.
sentences.chinese: 另一列火車正朝他們駛過來，兩個小男孩卻渾然不知。

sentences.english: Vernet glanced at the key but made no move to touch it.
sentences.chinese: 韋爾內看了一眼那把鑰匙，卻沒有去動它。

sentences.english: The people who allowed torture have faced no punishment at all.
sentences.chinese: 而那些允許酷刑的人卻不會受到任何處罰。

sentences.english: But i heard you are the best.
sentences.chinese: 在某個領域裏最優秀，卻又不以此自矜。

sentences.english: But those justifications have an incontestable value in their own day.
sentences.chinese: 但是這些辯解在當時卻具有必要的意義。

sentences.english: The horse's strides are shorter than at the other canters, without losing elasticity and cadence.
sentences.chinese: 馬的步幅比其他幾種跑步較短，但卻不失彈性與節奏。

sentences.english: I love it most , making me calm and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 此生最愛的東西，我愛她到狂熱，她卻令我心靜。

sentences.english: Has carved out a pen and a round of bitter and sweet.
sentences.chinese: 卻刻出了一支又一支揮繞不去的苦澀和甜蜜。

sentences.english: Tarrou, the chief fighter against the disease, is infected and dies.
sentences.chinese: 對抗疾病的先鋒塔魯卻染病身亡。

sentences.english: Slipper dream compared to the people, Kate has overturned that idea.
sentences.chinese: 相比人們的水晶鞋夢，凱特卻顛覆了這種觀念。

sentences.english: The people, however, continued to sacrifice at the high places, but only to the Lord their God.
sentences.chinese: 百姓卻仍在丘壇上獻祭，只獻給耶和華他們的神。

sentences.english: But she did not tell her husband Nabal.
sentences.chinese: 這事她卻沒有告訴丈夫拿八。

sentences.english: As to whether this accords with legal principle, it is disputable.
sentences.chinese: 但是否符合法律原理，卻值得商榷。

sentences.english: Few data on air pollution exposure and risk of venous thrombosis are available.
sentences.chinese: 但是關於空氣污染與靜脈血栓關係的數據卻很有限。

sentences.english: Chinese government is popular with the people because the government brings stability and wealth to the people.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府卻因爲爲人民帶來了穩定和財富而深得民心。

sentences.english: The libtard morons got change but for the worse.
sentences.chinese: 自由主義白癡們改變了，但卻變得更糟。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
